Iddhi Sutta：1．Iddhi Sutta．-Anuruddha tells the monks that by cultivating the four satipatthānas，he enjoys psychic power in many ways，such as multiplying himself．He can reach even to the Brahma world．S．v．303．



2．Iddhi Sutta．-Same as above，but the psychic power is that of the divine power of hearing all things，far and near．S．v．304．
